description:
When Knog first wanted to build the Cobber line, 18 factories told them it couldn’t be done, Knog persisted and the result is dazzling. Using chip on board (COB) LEDs the Cobber line creates a wall of light, like a screen, but way brighter. At only 39 grams per light, it's a worthwhile addition to your bike kit.

  • 330° viewing angle keeps you seen
  • Maintains brightness for up to 90% of battery capacity
  • Magnetic mount clicks in place on bars, posts, seatstays or headtubes up to 20cm circumference
  • Free ModeMaker app lets you customize your light’s modes
  • 8 different modes including: steady (high and low), pulse, flash (standard, rolling, side, disco and eco)
  • IP67 waterproof design sheds rain
  • Simple 1-button interface cycles through modes
  • Lockout mode prevents accidental activation
  • Integrated USB plug (type-A)
  • LED battery status indicator
  • Dimensions: 28 x 43 x 62mm
name: Knog Mid Cobber Rear Light
